plot: In the New Amsterdam Colony of 1653 to 1665, Peter Stuyvesant, Director General of the West India Company, exerts an iron hand over the people in the newly founded American settlement which was to become New York.
title: Peter Stuyvesant
plot_es: In the New Amsterdam Colony of 1653 to 1665, Peter Stuyvesant, Director General of the West India Company, exerts an iron hand over the people in the newly founded American settlement which was to become New York.
plot_en: In the New Amsterdam Colony of 1653 to 1665, Peter Stuyvesant, Director General of the West India Company, exerts an iron hand over the people in the newly founded American settlement which was to become New York.
